name: Escape the Dream World
description:
Escape the Dream World is a 3D action game in which you must find your way out of a strange world by solving switch puzzles and defeating enemies.

Made with Godot in a month for the OpenGameArt WInter Game Jam 2022

It's not everything I wanted it to be, but I'm out of time so it's "finished" :)
If you download the source, you have permission to use any of the modified assets under the same license as the original
